comments.body: It seems weird to return `false` when everything's okay. I don't know how much we want to worry about this for an internal interface, particularly if it matches up to the external API, but Go methods usually return a boolean that's `true` to indicate success.
@ericchiang we return complete status instead incomplete here?

Or just infer "incomplete" from the error and not return a boolean.

I don't think it matters a ton, but the current bool is kinda weird.
